Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا تُسْلِمُ
enWisdom: This world betrays

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا خُسْرَانٌ
enWisdom: This world is a loss [for those who seek it]

Wisdom: الْكَمَالُ فِي الدُّنْيَا مَفْقُودٌ
enWisdom: Perfection [of what is desired] is non-existent in this world

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا سُوقُ الْخُسْرَانِ
enWisdom: This world is a market of loss

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا مَزْرَعَةُ الشَّرِّ
enWisdom: This world is the plantation of evil

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا ضَحْكَةُ مُسْتَعْبِرٍ
enWisdom: This world is a laugh for the one whose tears flow [in sadness] (or for the one who is deluded by it)

Wisdom: الْعَاجِلَةُ مُنْيَةُ الْأَرْجَاسِ
enWisdom: The transient world is the desire of the filthy

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا مُنْيَةُ الْأَشْقِيَاءِ
enWisdom: This world is the aspiration of the wretched

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا مُطَلَّقَةُ الْأَكْيَاسِ
enWisdom: This world is the divorcée of the sagacious

Wisdom: الْعَاجِلَةُ غُرُورُ الْحَمْقَى
enWisdom: The transient world is the delusion [or the deluder] of the unintelligent

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا مَصْرَعُ الْعُقُولِ
enWisdom: This world is the place where the intellects fall

Wisdom: التَّكَبُّرُ بِالدُّنْيَا قُلٌّ
enWisdom: Being arrogant about [one’s status in] this world is deficiency

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا غَنِيمَةُ الْحَمْقَى
enWisdom: This world is the prize of the unintelligent

Wisdom: الدَّهْرُ مُوَكَّلٌ بِتَشْتِيتِ الْأُلَّافِ
enWisdom: Time is responsible for the separation of loved ones

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا سَمٌّ آكِلُهُ مَنْ لَا يَعْرِفُهُ
enWisdom: This world is a poison that is ingested by the one who does not know it

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا أَصْغَرُ وَأَحْقَرُ وَأَنْزَرُ مِنْ أَنْ تُطَاعَ فِيهَا الْأَحْقَادُ
enWisdom: This world is smaller, more lowly and more insignificant than for one to keep grudges in [and because of] it

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا جَنَّةُ الْكَافِرِ وَالْمَوْتُ مُشْخِصُهُ وَالنَّارُ مَثْوَاهُ
enWisdom: This world is a Paradise for the disbeliever, death is his dispatcher and hell is his [permanent] dwelling

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا ظِلُّ الْغَمَامِ وَحُلُمُ الْمَنَامِ
enWisdom: This world is [like] the shadow of clouds and the dream that is seen while asleep

Wisdom: أَغْضِ عَلَى الْقَذَى وَإِلَّا لَمْ تَرْضَ أَبَداً
enWisdom: Bear [the actions of others] with patience, otherwise you will never be pleased

Wisdom: أَلَا حُرٌّ يَدَعُ هَذِهِ اللُّمَاظَةَ لِأَهْلِهَا
enWisdom: Is there no freeman who would forsake this leftover for those who deserve it?

Wisdom: أَلَا وَمَا يَصْنَعُ بِالدُّنْيَا مَنْ خُلِقَ لِلْآخِرَةِ وَمَا يَصْنَعُ بِالْمَالِ مَنْ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ يُسْلَبُهُ وَيَبْقَى عَلَيْهِ حِسَابُهُ وَتَبِعَتُهُ
enWisdom: Indeed, what must one who has been created for the Hereafter do with this world? And what can one do with wealth when it will be taken away from him shortly while its accountability and consequences remain with him?

Wisdom: إِنَّ مِنْ هَوَانِ الدُّنْيَا عَلَى اللَّهِ أَنْ لَا يُعْصَى إِلَّا فِيهَا وَلَا يُنَالُ مَا عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِتَرْكِهَا
enWisdom: It is from the lowliness of this world in front Allah is that He is not disobeyed anywhere except in it And from the [signs of the] contemptibleness of this world in the sight of Allah is that one does not gain that which is with Him except by abandoning it

Wisdom: إِنَّ الدَّهْرَ لَخَصْمٌ غَيْرُ مَخْصُومٍ وَمُحْتَكِمٌ غَيْرُ ظَلُومٍ وَمُحَارِبٌ غَيْرُ مَحْرُوبٍ
enWisdom: Verily time is an enemy who is not shown enmity, a [chosen] judge who is not unjust and a fighter who has not [and cannot be] fought

Wisdom: إِنَّ دُنْيَاكُمْ هَذِهِ لَأَهْوَنُ فِي عَيْنِي مِنْ عُرَاقِ [عَرْقِ‏] خِنْزِيرٍ فِي يَدِ مَجْذُومٍ وَأَحْقَرُ مِنْ وَرَقَةٍ فِي جَرَادَةٍ [فِي فَمِ جَرَادَةٍ] مَا لِعَلِيٍّ وَنَعِيمٍ يَفْنَى وَلَذَّةٍ لَا تَبْقَى
enWisdom: This world of yours is more lowly in my view than the [decayed] bone of a pig in the hand of a leper and more inferior than a leaf in the mouth of a locust; what does ‘Ali have to do with bounties that will perish and pleasures that will not last?

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا حَظُّ أَحَدِكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الطُّولِ وَالْعَرْضِ قِيدُ قَدِّهِ مُتَعَفِّراً عَلَى خَدِّهِ
enWisdom: Indeed, the only share of the earth for every one of you is the length and breadth of his own stature, [of the grave] wherein he would lie on his cheeks covered with dust

Wisdom: إِذَا ابْيَضَّ أَسْوَدُكَ مَاتَ أَطْيَبُكَ
enWisdom: When you’re black [hair] becomes white, your best [part of life] has passed away

Wisdom: إِذَا صَعَدَتْ رُوحُ الْمُؤْمِنِ إِلَى السَّمَاءِ تَعَجَّبَتِ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَقَالَتْ عَجَباً كَيْفَ نَجَا مِنْ دَارٍ فَسَدَ فِيهَا خِيَارُنَا
enWisdom: When the soul of a believer ascends to the heavens, the angels are amazed and say: It is incredible how he was saved from a place where the best of us got corrupted

Wisdom: بِئْسَتِ الدَّارُ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: How bad an abode this world is!

Wisdom: حَيُّ الدُّنْيَا بِعَرَضِ مَوْتٍ وَصَحِيحُهَا عَرَضُ [غَرَضُ‏] الْأَسْقَامِ وَدَرِيئَةُ الْحِمَامِ
enWisdom: حي الدنيا بعرض موت، وصحيحها عرض الأسقام، ودريئة الحمام

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الدُّنْيَا حَسْرَةٌ وَشَرُّهَا نَدَمٌ
enWisdom: The good of this world is [a cause of] sorrow and its evil is [a cause of] regret

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الدُّنْيَا زَهِيدٌ وَشَرُّهَا عَتِيدٌ
enWisdom: The good of this world is insignificant and its evil is ready at hand

Wisdom: خَابَ رَجَاؤُهُ وَمَطْلَبُهُ مَنْ كَانَتِ الدُّنْيَا أَمَلَهُ وَأَرَبَهُ
enWisdom: The aspiration and pursuit of one whose hope and desire is [acquiring felicity in] this world, is frustrated

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ الدُّنْيَا أَدْوَأُ الْأَدْوَاءِ
enWisdom: Recalling [the pleasures of] this world is the worst of all maladies

Wisdom: رِضَاكَ بِالدُّنْيَا مِنْ سُوءِ اخْتِيَارِكَ وَشَقَاءِ جَدِّكَ
enWisdom: Your being content with this world is from your bad choices and your wretched endeavours

Wisdom: غِذَاءُ الدُّنْيَا سِمَامٌ وَأَسْبَابُهَا رِمَامٌ
enWisdom: The foods of this world are poisons and its means are worn-out [and weak] ropes

Wisdom: قَدْ يَتَفَاصَلُ الْمُتَفَاصِلَانِ وَيَشِتُّ جَمْعُ الْأَلِيفَيْنِ
enWisdom: The two that are attached to each other may get detached and the two groups that are united may get separated

Wisdom: قَلِيلُ الدُّنْيَا لَا يَدُومُ بَقَاؤُهُ وَكَثِيرُهَا لَا يُؤْمَنُ بَلَاؤُهُ
enWisdom: The little of this world does not last and its abundance is not safe from calamities

Wisdom: كُلُّ أَرْبَاحِ الدُّنْيَا خُسْرَانٌ
enWisdom: Every profit of this world is a loss

Wisdom: كُلُّ نَعِيمِ الدُّنْيَا ثُبُورٌ
enWisdom: Every bounty of this world is [headed towards] destruction

Wisdom: كُلُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا سَمَاعُهُ أَعْظَمُ مِنْ عِيَانِهِ
enWisdom: Everything in this world [is such that it] seems greater when heard than when seen

Wisdom: كُونُوا قَوْماً عَلِمُوا أَنَّ الدُّنْيَا لَيْسَتْ بِدَارِهِمْ فَاسْتَبْدَلُوا
enWisdom: Be a community that understands that this world is not their [permanent] abode so they exchange it [for the Hereafter]

Wisdom: كُلَّمَا فَاتَكَ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا شَيْ‏ءٌ فَهُوَ غَنِيمَةٌ
enWisdom: Every time something of this world slips away from you, it is an advantage [and a blessing]

Wisdom: لَدُنْيَاكُمْ عِنْدِي أَهْوَنُ مِنْ عُرَاقِ خِنْزِيرٍ عَلَى يَدِ مَجْذُومٍ
enWisdom: Verily this world of yours is more lowly in my view than the [dry] bone of a pig in the hand of a leper

Wisdom: لَيْسَ [لباس‏] الْمَتْجَرُ أَنْ تَرَى الدُّنْيَا لِنَفْسِكَ ثَمَناً وَمِمَّا لَكَ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ عِوَضاً
enWisdom: It is not a [good] trade to consider this world to be a price for your soul and a substitute to that which is for you with Allah

Wisdom: لَتَعْطِفَنَّ عَلَيْنَا الدُّنْيَا بَعْدَ شِمَاسِهَا عَطْفَ الضَّرُوسِ عَلَى وَلَدِهَا
enWisdom: This world will incline towards us after having been refractory just like the wild camel inclines towards its young

Wisdom: لَمْ يَصْفُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الدُّنْيَا لِأَوْلِيَائِهِ وَلَمْ يَضُنَّ بِهَا عَلَى أَعْدَائِهِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has not cleansed this world for His friends nor has He withheld it from His enemies

Wisdom: لَوْ عَقَلَ أَهْلُ الدُّنْيَا لَخَرِبَتِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: If the people of the world understood [the truth about it], this world would surely be ruined

Wisdom: لَوْ كَانَتِ الدُّنْيَا عِنْدَ اللَّهِ مَحْمُوداً لَاخْتَصَّ بِهَا أَوْلِيَاءَهُ لَكِنَّهُ صَرَفَ قُلُوبَهُمْ عَنْهَا وَمَحَا عَنْهُمْ مِنْهَا الْمَطَامِعَ
enWisdom: If this world was praiseworthy in front of Allah, He would have reserved it for His friends, but He turned their hearts away from it and expunged its desires from them

Wisdom: مَنْ كَانَتْ هِمَّتُهُ مَا يَدْخُلُ بَطْنَهُ كَانَتْ قِيمَتُهُ مَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: One whose efforts are [solely] for [acquiring] that which enters his stomach, his value is [equal to] that which comes out from it

Wisdom: مِنْ هَوَانِ الدُّنْيَا عَلَى اللَّهِ أَنْ لَا يُعْصَى إِلَّا فِيهَا
enWisdom: It is from the lowliness of this world in front Allah is that He is not disobeyed anywhere except in it

Wisdom: مِنْ ذَمَامَةِ الدُّنْيَا عِنْدَ اللَّهِ أَنْ لَا يُنَالَ مَا عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِتَرْكِهَا
enWisdom: From the [signs of the] contemptibleness of this world in the sight of Allah is that one does not gain that which is with Him except by abandoning it

Wisdom: مَا أَبْعَدَ الْخَيْرَ مِمَّنْ هِمَّتُهُ بَطْنُهُ وَفَرْجُهُ
enWisdom: How far is goodness from the one whose efforts are [solely] for his stomach and private parts!

Wisdom: مَتَاعُ الدُّنْيَا حُطَامٌ مُوبِئٌ فَتَجَنَّبُوا مَرْعَاةً قُلْعَتُهَا [مراعاة قلعتهما] أَحْظَى مِنْ طُمَأْنِينَتِهَا وَبُلْغَتُهَا أَزْكَى مِنْ ثَرْوَتِهَا [ترونها]
enWisdom: The wares of this world are [like] broken orts that cause epidemics, therefore keep off the grazing land which is more beneficial to migrate from than to peacefully stay in, and that of it which suffices for subsistence in it is purer [for the soul] than its riches

Wisdom: لَا تَرْفَعْ مَنْ رَفَعَتْهُ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Do not elevate the one who has been elevated by this world

Wisdom: لَا تُنَافِسْ فِي مَوَاهِبِ الدُّنْيَا فَإِنَّ مَوَاهِبَهَا حَقِيرَةٌ
enWisdom: Do not jostle for the bounties of this world, for indeed its bounties are trifling

Wisdom: لَا يَرْعَوِي الْبَاقُونَ اجْتِرَاماً
enWisdom: There is no vice greater than persistence [in sinning]

Wisdom: لَا يُفْلِحُ مَنْ يَسُرُّهُ مَا يَضُرُّهُ
enWisdom: One who is pleased by that which harms him will not be successful

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي لَذَّةٍ لَا تَبْقَى
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: يَا دُنْيَا يَا دُنْيَا إِلَيْكِ عَنِّي أَ بِي تَعَرَّضْتِ أَمْ إِلَيَّ تَشَوَّقْتِ لَا حَانَ حِينُكِ غُرِّي غَيْرِي لَا حَاجَةَ لِي فِيكِ قَدْ طَلَّقْتُكِ ثَلَاثاً لَا رَجْعَةَ لِي فِيهَا فَعَيْشُكِ قَصِيرٌ وَخَطَرُكِ يَسِيرٌ وَأَمْلُكِ حَقِيرٌ آهِ مِنْ قِلَّةِ الزَّادِ وَطُولِ الطَّرِيقِ وَبُعْدِ السَّفَرِ وَعِظَمِ الْمَوْرِدِ
enWisdom: world, O world! Get away from me! Is it me that you present yourself to? Or is it I that you are eager for? May your time never come! Deceive some other personI have no need for youI have divorced you thrice, after which there is no reunionYour life is short, your significance is little and your hope is worthlessAlas! How meagre the provision, how long the way, how distant the journey and how great the destination!
